Package com.dhk.window

Class MinimizeToTray

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.window.MinimizeToTray
public class MinimizeToTray extends Object
This class enables the application to be minimized to the system tray and restored from the system tray.
Version:
1.3.1
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2024
